briefTitle: The Clinical Value of an Artificial Intelligence System Using Abbreviated Protocol of Breast MRI Facilitates Classification of Breast Lessions
officialTitle: The Clinical Value of an Artificial Intelligence System Using Abbreviated Protocol of Breast MRI Facilitates Classification of Breast Lessions
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison between the diagnostic performance of【AP breast MRI + AI】 vs. 【Radiologist】, using the pathological results as golden standard,
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients with breast lesions detected by ultrasound and mammography that cannot be characterized
2. Patients who were consecutively included in our hospital for breast MRI without treatment
3. Underwent preoperative full-protocol breast MRI
4. Pathological results are available, of which benign lesions can be determined by follow-up

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Poor MRI image quality
2. Patients who have been received the biopsy
